project_context: WebSurfer-β: Autonomous web-surfing agent with Mac Studio LLM endpoint integration and Browser MCP automation. 5-step ADK workflow: SetGoal → PlanBrowsingPath → IterativeBrowse → SummarizeOrExtract → SaveMemory. Currently implementing core functionality.

active_tasks: Complete requirements.txt with Mac Studio + Browser MCP deps
Create .env.example for Mac Studio endpoint config
Implement Mac Studio LLM integration (5 models)
Implement Browser MCP integration for Chrome

decisions: Use Mac Studio endpoint instead of multiple LLM providers
Use Browser MCP instead of Selenium/Playwright

adr.title: Use Mac Studio Local LLM Endpoint
adr.decision: Integrate with Ollama via https://matiass-mac-studio.tail174e9b.ts.net/v1 instead of cloud LLM providers

adr.title: Use Browser MCP for Automation
adr.decision: Use Browser MCP with Chrome extension instead of Selenium/Playwright for web automation
